title: 2017 NFL Playoff matchups we want to see
itunes:title: 2017 NFL Playoff matchups we want to see
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler & Colleen Wolfe- recap Monday night's matchup between the Falcons and Bucs (3:00); Diddy's interest in buying the "North" Carolina Panthers (12:00); A buff-looking Ezekiel Elliott is set to return to the Cowboys (19:00); Marc and Dan tell creepy ghost stories (19:00); Which playoff matchups does everyone want to see the most? (30:00); Which NFL player's number would you retire? (40:00); And much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
